rooms.description: Main entrance with a vestibule aligned to east for auspiciousness as per Vastu.
Spacious living area designed with modern aesthetics; large windows on eastern side for sunlight.
Dining space adjacent to the kitchen and living room; integrates with open-plan layout.
Fully equipped kitchen placed on the north side for efficient workflow; includes storage and prep areas.
Dedicated space for domestic help with essential facilities; positioned towards the rear to maintain privacy.
A guest bedroom located on the ground floor for ease of access; has an attached ensuite.
Utility area with storage and laundry facilities; designed for efficient service operations.

openings.description: Double door entry to accommodate vehicles and visitors; aligned with local traffic patterns.
Large gate opening leading into the extensive garden area, providing natural light and ventilation.
Balconies attached to living room and guest room for improved cross-ventilation and Vastu compliance.
Separate entry point for staff, ensuring smooth movement of goods and service personnel.
